footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Electro Traveler | Update Date: 09/27/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Sapwood Blade, Freedom Sworn, Key of Khaj-Nisut, The Alley Flash, Jade Cutter

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery or ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Bellowing Thunder
**2)** Elemntal Skill: Lightning Blade
**3)** Normal Attack: Foreign Thundershock

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Only build for Elemental Mastery when Energy Requirements are met, and is playing for Quicken Teams. Instructors and Noblesse Oblige will work for less personal damage but increased Team DPS.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Electro Traveler | Update Date: 09/27/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Sacrificial Sword, Festering Desire, Amenoma Kageuchi, Skyrider Sword, Skyward Blade

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Bellowing Thunder
Elemental Skill and Normal Attack are not needed for this build.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Running Noblesse Oblige will result in higher team DPS but will require hyperinvestment into the Traveler's Energy Recharge.
